name: Snake 3D (itch) (JHSoftware)
description:
Hey all, I'm Johnny and this is my humble game.

Snakes 3D is a single player game originally made for mobile devices, but it's really fun on PC to play sometimes when your bored.

So if you like this game and you want me to make it even more fun. Hit the like button and leave a suggestion.

Futures that will get implemented:

Level Editor

Multiplayer Support

Cross Platform Support

Thank you!

#arcade #scifi
